products.title: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
products.description: Premium wireless headphones with noise cancellation, crystal-clear sound quality, and comfortable over-ear design. Enjoy up to 30 hours of battery life and quick charging feature.

reviews.title: Amazing sound quality!
reviews.text: These headphones sound incredible. The noise cancellation is top-notch too.

reviews.title: Great but could be better
reviews.text: Sound is great but I wish the ear cups were a bit larger for comfort.

products.title: Smartphone Pro Max
products.description: Latest flagship smartphone with 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, triple-camera system, and the fastest chip ever in a smartphone. Available in multiple colors.

reviews.title: Best phone I've ever owned
reviews.text: The camera is incredible and battery life is phenomenal!

products.title: Ultra HD Smart TV 65"
products.description: Experience stunning 4K resolution with this 65-inch smart TV. Features include voice control, streaming apps, and game mode for immersive entertainment.

products.title: Smart Fitness Watch
products.description: Track your fitness goals with this advanced smartwatch. Features heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, GPS, and water resistance up to 50 meters.

products.title: Professional Blender
products.description: High-performance blender with variable speed control, pulse feature, and hardened stainless-steel blades. Perfect for smoothies, soups, and more.

products.title: Ergonomic Office Chair
products.description: Comfortable ergonomic chair with lumbar support, adjustable height, and breathable mesh back. Perfect for long work sessions.

products.title: Coffee Maker Deluxe
products.description: Programmable coffee maker with thermal carafe keeps coffee hot for hours. Features include brew strength control and auto-shutoff.
